```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library("gtsummary")
library("ggplot2")

options(knitr.table.format="html")
```

```{r}
df1=df%>% filter(case==1)
```

# case
```{r}
  tbl_summary(
    df1[col],
    statistic = list(all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})"))

```


# control
```{r}

    df0[col],
    statistic = list(all_continuous() ~ "{mean} ({sd})"))
```
